about_the_game:
This DLC contains 13 BGM soundtracks used in the game, including three game themes, three CEO themes, one Dongdong themes, two Lele themes, two Youjia themes, and two Qili themes.

This DLC contains 13 BGM soundtracks used in the game;
Among them, there are three game themes, three CEO themes, one Dongdong themes, two Lele themes, two Youjia themes, and two Qili themes;
The touch brought by the game may be fleeting, but the wonderful music can continue to preserve this beautiful moment. I hope that when you listen to these music, you can recall the good memories with her. If you can return to the game to relive the beauty of that moment again, we will be honored;
This DLC is the first updated DLC, and there will be picture collection and video collection DLC to be updated later;
You can download and listen to the music in this DLC, but you cannot use it for any commercial purpose;
